product_name: Sugoi RPM Bike Jacket - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With its lightweight, durable fabric, the Sugoi RPM Bike Jacket for women offers waterproof, breathable protection without weighing you down. Waterproof, breathable 2.5-layer laminated shell protects against chilling wind and moisture. Microfleece lining at collar is soft and warm. Collar's center-back scallop pattern gives your neck ergonomic comfort in the ride position. Waterproof front zipper and taped seams add weather protection. Droptail back protects your backside from spray and rain. Sugoi RPM bike jacket for women offers reflective details to boost your visibility. Closeout.
short_description: With its lightweight, durable fabric, the Sugoi RPM Bike Jacket for women offers waterproof, breathable protection without weighing you down.
